name: Blink (itch) (tea_mori)
description:
What if you woke up and realized everything you thought you knew was a lie?

In this first person survival horror, awaken from the nightmare that you've finally opened your eyes to. Use your wits and sometimes your strength to pave your own escape to a world just behind the basement doors. But make sure to be careful not to lose your sanity in the process. When in doubt take a moment, breathe, and close your eyes. 

Notes:

-This project is a short horror game made within October 2021 for Devtober

-Hopefully, this game will gain a second section with multiple endings in the future!

-Let me know any thoughts or problems you may have so that I may address them in future updates

Objectives: 

Escape

Controls:

C-Control menu

Space- Interact

WASD- walk

Mouse-Look around

E-Close eyes

F-Flashlight (once aquired)

Hints:

-If it seems too dark, find a flashlight or a well lit area

-If logic fails you, try strength
